help-file.title: "ENTROPY STORM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Healing, Fear
"Entropy Storm" heals all undead creatures in a room and causes the caster to assume a frightening visage. Upon seeing this visage, immense and sudden fear can cause anyone not grouped with the caster to flee in terror in a random direction.
